other_title: Drifters: Battle in a Brand-New World War
plot: Shimazu Toyohisa is the real-life samurai who fought in the pivotal Battle of Sekigahara. In his dying moments, Shimazu is transported to a world of magic with other famous warriors throughout history. These warriors are forced to fight each other in an endless battle.
opening_theme: "Gospel of the Throttle (Kyouhon REMIX ver.)" by Minutes Til Midnight
ending_theme: "Rurou no Zakuro" (流浪の柘榴; Pomegranate for a Wanderer) by Yasushi Ishii (ep 12)
